original_text: Thus Israel settled in the land of Egypt, in the land of Goshen. And they gained possessions in it, and were fruitful and multiplied greatly.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속이 애굽 고센 땅에 거주하며 거기서 생업을 얻어 생육하고 번성하였더라

sentences.original_text: Thus Israel settled in the land of Egypt
And they gained possessions in it
and were fruitful and multiplied greatly
